Articles.Content:
...After all these delays, please welcome the 3rd episode of my Kerbal space program series!

*Kerbal audience claps*

After a long time (approx. one month) my 3rd episode is out.

Find it here:

The reason it was delayed because my microphone had failed, I crashed my rocket, too busy, lost the video, so on.

Now first for those of you who are new to me you can see my first post:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...am-01-(repost)

Anyways for this episode of KSP I will launch 2 rockets into LKO and attempt rendezvous and docking

(I find it easier than some other people for some reason).

Later I plan to launch a space station into LKO for the next episode.

Now, for this episode, I now declare that from now on I will try to publish a video every week.

I hope you enjoy my video and please like and subscribe if you have not done so .

Thanks!

-It'snorocketscience
